divs: sighting detailsthis was seen by me and my cousin as kids. we were playing in front of my aunt's\uncles's with my grandmother's behind us. our family lived next door to each other. we noticed a light ball, red orange clingfilm around their chimney & frightened us since never seeing anything like it. it appeared to be intelligent. it would go around the chimney one way, stop, go around the other direction. we knew it wasn't a fire spark since it was as big as a basketball or more, and it was summer time. i looked at my cousin and said my house is closer, do you want to come with me? he said no, i'm running home, which was approximately 1000 yards away, while i was 50 yards away from my house. we said nothing about it again. there are more inconstant, 2 more i recall, but will try to describe these later, or if you want to call and speak more of them, i would be happy to. the reason why is i am now legally blind, stargardt disease\visually impaired, and is difficult for me at this time...
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Over my nieghbor's/Aunt/Uncle's house Circling chimney stopping and starting several times
